message.body: Yes!
Hey. Sorry I haven't responded much in the group texts. Work's been busy. How are you feeling?
Oh no worries! My stomach is feeling okay, but my sister is just getting over her bug so hopefully it stays this way. Other than that, my throat is sore and my nose is runny

Man. Everyone has been getting sick again. I hope you feel better soon! It with be awful to have a cold and get a stomach bug. I will pray for you, so to speak. But I did want to tell you something. I was hoping to tell everyone in person tonight....
I put in my two weeks notice at Kindred two days ago.
I got a job at Penn!
AH AH AHHHHH!!!!!!
Yay!!!!!!!!!!!! That's so awesomely amazing! Omg yay! FINALLY! I'm so happy for you!
Yes. It's so great. It's outpatient. So no more 12 hour shifts.
So what would be your hours???
Monday through Friday 830 to 5.
No weekends. No holidays.
Omg that's going to be so nice!!!!!
And the pay is a little higher. Outpatient does pay less unfortunately.
I'm so excited!
I start May 11th. So I'll have a two week break in between jobs.
I interviewed about a month ago and I've been so stressed! I did not feel good about it so I didn't tell anyone.
That makes it all the more better! Oh that's soooo great though!!! Congratulations!
Thank you. I wish I could have told you in person. Feel better! Hope to see you soon!

Thanks! We'll need to celebrate during your two weeks off. I'll be in the middle of finals during those weeks, but they're a week apart so we can totally make it work!
Besides, I think we need to catch up anyway.
Yes! Sounds good.
Yup!
Haha. Jenny....
I'm good if you want to stay local Sam. Just let us know!
Oh Jenny. I know.
